name: Seasons of Aracaza OST
description:
In the futuristic yet magical world of Arcaza, an evil elemental shaman “Beelzebub”, who once terrorized the nation and bent on world domination, has broken free from his solitary confinement and is now enacting terror on the world again.
Beelzebub is enacting retribution for those who sent him into confinement by entrapping the “Overseers” of the 2 seasons - Sumaltar and Wingtall - and putting an end to the world as we know it.

With the Overseers of the seasons imprisoned, the world witnesses a seasonal change like no other. Sumal, Faltar, Wring  have melded into one season - disrupting the harmony of the natural world.

You are Aleyx Meydrad. As the offspring of the great warriors who once put a stop to Beelzebub, you are tasked to take up arms and put a stop to Beelzebub once more.

You must travel to the temples of the overseers - overcome the challenges set by Beelzebub and free them from their shackles.

Lastly, you will face off with Beelzebub and put a stop to him once more.
